page.title: 14ATTITUDES OF FARM WORKER
page.content: We spoke to a resident who worked in Boothby Pagnell on one of it's many farms. He was 60 years old and he had worked for 45 years on the same farm, but he had not always lived in Boothby Pagnell. His 2 married daughters worked in the nearest town of Grantham but his wife stayed at home and was a housewife. To do the usual shopping of food he went to Grantham and for the buying of clothes he went to Nottingham. In the freetime which he got, he and his wife just watched television and relaxed or he read a book which he got from the mobile library. He told us that there were quite a few mobile services including a reliable bus service.
